form.name: personal_hygiene_practices_1
form.page_subtitle: ANC Counselling: Personal hygiene practices> Personal hygiene practices 1

field.name: Advise client to keep her body clean, especially hands, genital area and breasts to minimise infection Avoid douching, insertion of herbal products and use of tampons
Use clean cotton underwear, and use loose fitting clothing
Wipe genitals from front to back (vulva to anus)
